author: iSazonov
body:
1. The PR "Allow Start-PSBuild -Output to take absolute path"  #2398  broke debuging in Visual Studio Code. (Cannot find file powershell).

I make revert the changes and the issue went away.
1. Additionally, I had to change line "/debug/" to "debug/" in file .gitignore because many are not excluded files appear in the folder src\powershell-win-core\debug. 
   This problem also appeared only today but don't know the reason.

@andschwa please take attention
title: #2398  broke debuging in Visual Studio Code
